root.name: NASCAR 2001
root.description: OverviewNASCAR 2001 was released on the PlayStation on September 19, 2000 and the PlayStation 2 on November 7, 2000. NASCAR 2001 was the first NASCAR game from EA Sports to appear on the PlayStation 2 and the fourth game in EA's NASCAR series.DriversRealSteve Park-#1 Pennzoil ChevyRusty Wallace-#2 Rusty* Ford (Removing the Miller Lite decal due to alcohol references)Dale Earnhardt-#3 GM Goodwrench Service Plus ChevyBobby Hamilton-#4 Kodak ChevyTerry Labonte-#5 Kellogs ChevyMark Martin-#6 Valvoline FordMichael Waltrip-#7 Nations Rent ChevyDale Earnhardt Jr.-#8 Dale Jr.* Chevy (Removing the Budweiser decal due to alcohol references)Jeremy Mayfield-#12 Mobile 1 FordKevin Lepage-#16 FamilyClick.com
